ProductInfo.Features:

<7> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <8> 58mm UV Filter + <9> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <10> PD Digital SLR Camera Case +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> LCD Screen Protectors + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with 75-300mm Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Case + Filters + Flash + Tripod + Accessory Kit
